comments.en:
Japanese version of the Epson Stylus Photo 950/960.

7-ink (CcMmYyK) high-end photo printer with roll feeder, automatic paper cutter, full bleed (borderless) printing, prints also directly on CDs.

96 nozzles per color.

USB and Parallel.

4- and 6-ink printing supported in Gimp-Print 4.2.2rc2, 4.3.4, or newer. 7-ink printing support is under development. Testers are welcome.

Consumables/Refills: 7 separate ink tanks: Cyan, light cyan, magenta, light magenta, yellow, dark yellow
